info.name: Loyalty Contact API v0.3.1
info.description:
This API is used to manage everything related to contacts in your loyalty program.

Contact Support:
 Name: Amit Smoller
 Email: amit@loyalsys.io

item.name: Delete a contact from the loyalty program.

header.description: (Required) The ID of the contact. Usually their email or your customer identifier. Make sure it's the same as what is always passed to Emarsys

request.description: Deletes the contact including all their activities and rewards. IMPORTANT - This cannot be undone.

response.name: Contact deleted successfully

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
(Required) The ID of the contact. Usually their email or your customer identifier. Make sure it's the same as what is always passed to Emarsys

response.name:
A GenericError is the default error message that is generated.
For certain status codes there are more appropriate error structures.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
(Required) The ID of the contact. Usually their email or your customer identifier. Make sure it's the same as what is always passed to Emarsys
(Required) The ID of the contact. Usually their email or your customer identifier. Make sure it's the same as what is always passed to Emarsys
The ISO identifier of the language in which to return the results. (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes)

query.description: Whether you need the tier expiration data. Send this param in the querystring =true to get this data.
Whether you need the details about points when they were accumulated and their expiration date. Send this parameter in the query string =true to get this data.

request.description: Pass the contact's Id (as identified by the shop, e.g. email, shop customer Id, ...) and get all their loyalty information.

item.name: Change the contact's loyalty plan e.g. from B2B to B2C. Only relevant for customers that have multiple plans.

header.description: (Required) The ID of the contact. Usually their email or your customer identifier. Make sure it's the same as what is always passed to Emarsys
The ID of the plan as defined by the marketer.
